summary: Feature request to allow setting default activity options at worker creation time, similar to Java's WorkflowImplementationOptions.activityOptions, to enable configuration via config files or environment variables rather than hardcoding.
userImpact: Users must hardcode activity options instead of configuring them via environment variables or config files across different environments.
proposedFix: Implement a mechanism similar to Java's WorkflowImplementationOptions.activityOptions to allow default activity options to be set at worker creation.
workaround: Hardcode activity options in the workflow implementation.
resolutionDetails: Use case was not considered clear enough. Suggested that if needed, such a feature should also include other types of commands.
keyQuote: It looks like currently the only option for setting `ActivityOptions` is by hard-coding them since there is no way to pass in options by reading environment variables or config files.
